keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

byline.original: By HELENE COOPER and MATTHEW ROSENBERG

lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Ashton B. Carter recommended Gen. Mark Milley as army chief of staff, and Adm. John Richardson as the next chief of naval operations.

headline.print_headline: Nominations to Lead Army and Navy Are Announced
headline.main: Defense Secretary Nominates New Army and Navy Chiefs

snippet: Defense Secretary Ashton B. Carter recommended Gen. Mark Milley as army chief of staff, and Adm. John Richardson as the next chief of naval operations.
abstract: Defense Sec Ashton B Carter recommends Gen Mark Milley, head of Army Forces Command at Fort Bragg, NC, to be Army chief of staff, and Adm John Richardson, head of the Navy’s nuclear program, as chief of naval operations; nominations must be confirmed by Senate.
